attributes.action: Make Prince Harry and Meghan Markle's Wedding a Public Bank Holiday.
attributes.additional_details: It is a disservice to him and Meghan not to have one, as his brother and Kate did. Harry is a man of the people who the public adore and relate too.
attributes.background: As a nation we have all fallen in love with Price Harry over the years, our very own lovable ginger and we should be able to celebrate his wedding by having a public bank holiday! It is a disservice to him and Meghan not to have one.
